altername_name: 大贝兽物语 波永的迷宫2
name: Daikaijuu Monogatari: Poyon no Dungeon Room 2
overview: Items are buried in the soil! Power up by digging yourself and going ahead and finding items. By picking up and using the "stones" that have fallen in the dungeon, the parameters will increase. There are many types of stones, such as "fire" and "water", which are attribute parameters, in addition to stones that increase the basic parameters "attack power" and "defense power", so you can use the stones to grow your own poyon. Yeah. If you use a communication cable, you can also play against "Mini Mecha Poyon" and "Dungeon Battle".
